description: Detects the creation of an executable by another executable Author: frack113. License: https://github.com/Neo23x0/sigma/blob/master/LICENSE.Detection.Rules.md
name: Creation of an Executable by an Executable
query: ((process.executable:*.exe AND file.path:*.exe) AND (NOT ((process.executable:"C\:\\WINDOWS\\system32\\svchost.exe" AND file.path:C\:\\Windows\\SoftwareDistribution\\Download\\Install\\*) OR (process.executable:C\:\\Windows\\WinSxS\\* AND process.executable:*\\TiWorker.exe) OR (process.executable:"C\:\\Windows\\System32\\msiexec.exe"))))
